00113 template <class T>
00114 class EGS_CYLINDERS_EXPORT EGS_CylindersT : public EGS_BaseGeometry
00115 {
00116   protected:
00117 
00118     EGS_Float *R,  
00119               *R2; 
00120     EGS_Vector xo; 
00121     T a;           
00122 
00123 #ifdef CYL_DEBUG
00124     EGS_Vector last_x, last_u;
00125     EGS_Float  last_t, last_d, last_B, last_A;
00126     int        last_ireg, last_dir;
00127 #endif
00128 
00129   public:
00130 
00135     ~EGS_CylindersT()
00136     { if(nreg) { delete [] R; delete [] R2; } };
00137 
00145     EGS_CylindersT(int nc, const EGS_Float *radius,
00146                    const EGS_Vector &position, const string &Name,
00147                    const T &A) : EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), a(A), xo(position)
00148     {
00149       if(nc>0)
00150       {  R=new EGS_Float [nc];
00151          R2=new EGS_Float [nc];
00152 
00153          for(int i=0;i<nc;i++)
00154          { R[i]=radius[i];
00155            R2[i]=radius[i]*radius[i];
00156          }
00157          nreg=nc;
00158       }
00159     };
00160 
00162     EGS_CylindersT(const vector<EGS_Float> &radius,
00163                    const EGS_Vector &position, const string &Name,
00164                     const T &A) : EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), a(A), xo(position)
00165     {
00166       if(radius.size()>0)
00167       { R=new EGS_Float [radius.size()];
00168         R2=new EGS_Float [radius.size()];
00169 
00170         for(int i=0;i<radius.size();i++)
00171         { R[i]=radius[i];
00172           R2[i]=radius[i]*radius[i];
00173         }
00174         nreg=radius.size();
00175       }
00176     };
00177 
00178     bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00179         EGS_Vector rc(x-xo);
00180         EGS_Float rp=a*rc, rho_sq=rc.length2()-rp*rp;
00181         if(rho_sq>R2[nreg-1]) return false;
00182         return true;
00183     };
00184 
00185     int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00186         EGS_Vector rc(x-xo);
00187         EGS_Float rp=a*rc, rho_sq=rc.length2()-rp*rp;
00188         if(rho_sq>R2[nreg-1]) return -1;
00189         if(rho_sq<R2[0]) return 0;
00190         return findRegion(rho_sq,nreg-1,R2)+1;
00191     };
00192 
00193     int inside(const EGS_Vector &x)
00194     {
00195       EGS_Vector rc(x-xo);
00196       EGS_Float
00197         rp=a*rc,
00198         rho_sq=rc.length2()-rp*rp;
00199 
00200       if(rho_sq>R2[nreg-1]) return -1;  // outside all cylinders
00201       if(rho_sq<R2[0]) return 0;  // inside central cylinder
00202 
00203       // find particle region
00204       int ic=0,oc=nreg,ms;
00205       while(oc-ic>1)
00206       { ms=(ic+oc)/2;
00207         if(rho_sq<R2[ms]) oc=ms;
00208         else ic=ms;
00209       }
00210       return oc;
00211     };
00212 
00213     EGS_Float howfarToOutside(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x,
00214             const EGS_Vector &u) {
00215         if( ireg < 0 ) return 0;
00216         EGS_Float up=a*u;
00217         if(fabs(up)>=1) return 1e30; // parallel to axis
00218         EGS_Float A=1-up*up;
00219         EGS_Vector rc(x-xo); EGS_Float rcp=a*rc, urc=u*rc;
00220         EGS_Float C=rc.length2()-rcp*rcp-R2[nreg-1];
00221         if( C >= 0 ) return 0;  // outside within precision
00222         EGS_Float B=urc-up*rcp;
00223         EGS_Float Dsq = sqrt(B*B-A*C);
00224         EGS_Float d = B > 0 ? -C/(Dsq + B) : (Dsq - B)/A;
00225         return d;
00226     };
00227 
00228     int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00229             EGS_Float &t, int *newmed = 0, EGS_Vector *normal = 0) {
00230 
00231         EGS_Float d=1e30;  // large distance to any boundry
00232 
00233         // projections
00234         double up=a*u;
00235         if(fabs(up)>=1) return ireg; // parallel to cylinder axis
00236         double A=1-up*up;        // d^2 coefficient
00237 
00238         int dir=-1; // direction entering or exiting cylinder boundry
00239 
00240         EGS_Vector rc(x-xo);
00241         double rcp=a*rc, urc=u*rc;
00242         double B=urc-up*rcp;  // d^1 coefficient
00243 
00244         EGS_Float rad;
00245 
00246         // in any region?
00247         if(ireg>=0) {
00248 
00249             double C=rc.length2()-rcp*rcp-R2[ireg]; // d^0 coefficient
00250 
00251             // B>=0 ... particle travelling radially outwards
00252             if(B>=0 || !ireg) {  // OR it is IN the centre cylinder
00253                 rad = -R[ireg];
00254                 dir=ireg+1;
00255                 if( dir >= nreg ) dir = -1;
00256                 double Dsq = B*B-A*C;
00257                 if( Dsq > 0 ) Dsq = sqrt(Dsq);
00258                 else {
00259                     if( Dsq < -1e-2 ) egsWarning("\nEGS_CylindersT::howfar(): "
00260                       "the particle may not be in the region\n   we think it "
00261                       "is as Dsq = %g\n",Dsq);
00262                     Dsq = 0;
00263                 }
00264                 //d=-B+sqrt(B*B-A*C);
00265                 d = B > 0 ? -C/(Dsq + B) : (Dsq - B)/A;
00266                 if( d < 0 ) {
00267                     if( C > 1e-2 ) {
00268                         egsWarning("\nEGS_CylindersT::howfar(): the particle "
00269                           "may not be in the region\n   we think it is as "
00270                           "Cout = %g\n",C);
00271                         egsWarning("   ireg=%d R2=%g R2[%d]=%g\n",ireg,
00272                                 rc.length2()-rcp*rcp,ireg,R2[ireg]);
00273                         egsWarning("x=(%g,%g,%g) u=(%g,%g,%g)\n",
00274                            x.x,x.y,x.z,u.x,u.y,u.z);
00275                         egsWarning("B=%g A=%g\n",B,A);
00276 #ifdef CYL_DEBUG
00277                         egsWarning("last:\n");
00278                         egsWarning("x=(%g,%g,%g) u=(%g,%g,%g)\n",
00279                          last_x.x,last_x.y,last_x.z,last_u.x,last_u.y,last_u.z);
00280                         egsWarning("B=%g A=%g ireg=%d inew=%d\n",
00281                                 last_B,last_A,last_ireg,last_dir);
00282                         egsWarning("t=%g d=%g\n",last_t,last_d);
00283 #endif
00284                     }
00285                     d = 1e-16;
00286                 }
00287             }
00288 
00289             // check for intersection with inner cylinder
00290             else {
00291                 double dR2=R2[ireg]-R2[ireg-1];
00292                 C+=dR2;
00293                 double D_sq=B*B-A*C;
00294 
00295                 if(D_sq<=0) { // outer cylinder intersection
00296                     rad = -R[ireg];
00297                     dir=ireg+1;
00298                     if( dir >= nreg ) dir = -1;
00299                     /*
00300                     D_sq+=A*C;               // should we not use
00301                     C-=dR2;                  // d = -B + sqrt(D_sq+A*dR2)
00302                     d=-B+sqrt(D_sq-A*C);     // instead?
00303                     */
00304                     D_sq += A*dR2;
00305                     if( D_sq > 0 ) D_sq = sqrt(D_sq);
00306                     else {
00307                         if( D_sq < -1e-2 )
00308                             egsWarning("\nEGS_CylindersT::howfar(): the "
00309                               "particle may not be in the region\n   we think "
00310                               "it is as D_sq = %g\n",D_sq);
00311                         D_sq = 0;
00312                     }
00313                     d = (D_sq - B)/A;
00314                 }
00315 
00316                 else  { // inner cylinder intersection
00317                     dir=ireg-1; rad = R[dir];
00318                     //d=-B-sqrt(D_sq);
00319                     d = C/(sqrt(D_sq) - B);
00320                     if( d < 0 ) {
00321                         if( C < -1e-2 ) egsWarning("EGS_CylindersT::howfar(): "
00322                           "the particle may not be in the region we think it "
00323                           "is as Cin = %g\n",C);
00324                         d = 1e-16;
00325                     }
00326                 }
00327             }
00328         }
00329 
00330         else {  // outside all regions
00331             if(B<0) { // particle travelling radially inwards
00332                 double C=rc.length2()-rcp*rcp-R2[nreg-1],
00333                           D_sq=B*B-A*C;
00334 
00335                 if(D_sq>0) { // cylinder intersection
00336                     dir=nreg-1; rad = R[dir];
00337                     //d=-B-sqrt(D_sq);
00338                     d = C/(sqrt(D_sq) - B);
00339                     if( d < 0 ) {
00340                         if( C < -1e-2 ) {
00341                             egsWarning("EGS_CylindersT::howfar(): "
00342                          "we think that the particle is outside, but C=%g\n",C);
00343                             egsWarning("  d=%g B=%g D_sq=%g\n",d,B,D_sq);
00344                             egsWarning("  ireg=%d x=(%g,%g,%g) u=(%g,%g,%g)\n",
00345                                ireg,x.x,x.y,x.z,u.x,u.y,u.z);
00346                         }
00347                         d = 1e-16;
00348                     }
00349                 }
00350             }
00351             else return ireg;
00352         }
00353         //d/=A;
00354 
00355 #ifdef CYL_DEBUG
00356         if( isnan(d) ) {
00357             egsWarning("d is nan: A=%g B=%g ireg=%d R2=%g\n",
00358                   A,B,ireg,rc.length2()-rcp*rcp);
00359         }
00360 
00361         last_x = x; last_u = u; last_B = B; last_A = A;
00362         last_ireg = ireg; last_dir = dir; last_t = t; last_d = d;
00363 #endif
00364 
00365         // correct t-step
00366         if(d<t) {
00367             t=d;
00368             if( newmed ) if( dir >= 0 ) *newmed = medium(dir); else *newmed=-1;
00369             if( normal ) {
00370                 EGS_Vector n(rc + u*t - a*(rcp+up*t)); *normal = n*(1/rad);
00371             }
00372             return dir;
00373         }
00374         return ireg;
00375     };
00376 
00377     EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x)
00378     {
00379       EGS_Vector rc(x-xo);
00380       EGS_Float
00381         rcp=a*rc,
00382         rho=sqrt(rc.length2()-rcp*rcp);
00383 
00384       // check outer cylinder first if inside geometry
00385       if(ireg>=0)
00386       { EGS_Float d=R[ireg]-rho;
00387 
00388         if(ireg)
00389         { EGS_Float dd=rho-R[ireg-1];
00390           if(dd<d) d=dd;
00391         }
00392 
00393         return d;
00394 
00395       }
00396 
00397       else return rho-R[nreg-1];
00398     };
00399 
00400     int getMaxStep() const {
00401         return 2*nreg + 1;
00402     };
00403 
00404     const string &getType() const { return a.getType(); };
00405 
00406     void printInfo() const
00407     { EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo();
00408       a.printInfo();
00409       egsInformation(" midpoint of cylinders = (%g,%g,%g)\n",xo.x,xo.y,xo.z);
00410       egsInformation(" cylinder radii = ");
00411       for(int j=0; j<nreg; j++) egsInformation("%g ",R[j]);
00412       egsInformation("\n");
00413       egsInformation("=====================================================\n");
00414     };
00415 };

00419   public:
00420     XProjector() {};
00421     EGS_Float operator*(const EGS_Vector &x) const {return x.x; };
00422     EGS_Vector operator*(EGS_Float t) const { return EGS_Vector(t,0,0); };
00423     EGS_Float length() const { return 1; };
00424     string &getType() const { return type; };
00425     void printInfo() const {};
00426   private:
00427     static string type;
00428 };

00454 class EGS_CYLINDERS_LOCAL Projector {
00455   public:
00456     Projector(const EGS_Vector &A) : a(A) {
00457         norm = a.length(); a.normalize();
00458     };
00459     EGS_Float operator*(const EGS_Vector &x) const {return a*x; };
00460     EGS_Vector operator*(EGS_Float t) const { return a*t; };
00461     EGS_Float length() const { return norm; };
00462     string &getType() const { return type; };
00463     void printInfo() const
00464     { egsInformation(" axis = (%g,%g,%g)\n",a.x,a.y,a.z); };
00465 
00466   private:
00467     EGS_Vector a;
00468     EGS_Float  norm;
00469     static string type;
00470 };
